question.text: There is a tractor ahead of you. You wish to overtake but you are NOT sure if it is safe to do so. You should

explanation.text: Never overtake if you’re not sure whether it’s safe. Can you see far enough down the road to ensure that you can complete the manoeuvre safely? If the answer is no, DON’T GO.

answer.text: sound your horn to the slow vehicle to pull over
speed through but flash your lights to oncoming traffic
not overtake if you are in doubt
